book_long_title: The Gospel According to St Matthew
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: When his disciples heard it, they were exceedingly amazed, saying, Who then can be saved?

book_long_title: The Gospel According to St Matthew
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: He saved others; himself he cannot save. If he be the King of Israel, let him now come down from the cross, and we will believe him.

book_long_title: The Gospel According to St Matthew
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: But he that shall endure unto the end, the same shall be saved.

book_long_title: The Gospel According to St Matthew
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: And except those days should be shortened, there should no flesh be saved: but for the elect's sake those days shall be shortened.

book_long_title: The Gospel According to St Matthew
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name's sake: but he that endureth to the end shall be saved.

book_long_title: The Gospel According to St Mark
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: And they were astonished out of measure, saying among themselves, Who then can be saved?

book_long_title: The Gospel According to St Mark
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: He that believeth and is baptized shall be saved; but he that believeth not shall be damned.

book_long_title: The Gospel According to St Mark
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: Likewise also the chief priests mocking said among themselves with the scribes, He saved others; himself he cannot save.

book_long_title: The Gospel According to St Mark
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name's sake: but he that shall endure unto the end, the same shall be saved.

book_long_title: The Gospel According to St Mark
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: And except that the Lord had shortened those days, no flesh should be saved: but for the elect's sake, whom he hath chosen, he hath shortened the days.

book_long_title: The Gospel According to St Luke
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: And Jesus said unto him, Receive thy sight: thy faith hath saved thee.

book_long_title: The Gospel According to St Luke
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: And they that heard it said, Who then can be saved?

book_long_title: The Gospel According to St Luke
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: Then said one unto him, Lord, are there few that be saved? And he said unto them,

book_long_title: The Gospel According to St Luke
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: And the people stood beholding. And the rulers also with them derided him, saying, He saved others; let him save himself, if he be Christ, the chosen of God.

book_long_title: The Gospel According to St Luke
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: That we should be saved from our enemies, and from the hand of all that hate us;

book_long_title: The Gospel According to St Luke
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: And he said to the woman, Thy faith hath saved thee; go in peace.

book_long_title: The Gospel According to St Luke
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: Those by the way side are they that hear; then cometh the devil, and taketh away the word out of their hearts, lest they should believe and be saved.

book_long_title: The Gospel According to St John
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: I am the door: by me if any man enter in, he shall be saved, and shall go in and out, and find pasture.

book_long_title: The Gospel According to St John
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: But I receive not testimony from man: but these things I say, that ye might be saved.

book_long_title: The Gospel According to St John
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: For God sent not his Son into the world to condemn the world; but that the world through him might be saved.

book_long_title: The Acts of the Apostles
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: And certain men which came down from Judaea taught the brethren, and said, Except ye be circumcised after the manner of Moses, ye cannot be saved.

book_long_title: The Acts of the Apostles
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: But we believe that through the grace of the Lord Jesus Christ we shall be saved, even as they.

book_long_title: The Acts of the Apostles
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: And brought them out, and said, Sirs, what must I do to be saved?

book_long_title: The Acts of the Apostles
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: And they said, Believe on the Lord Jesus Christ, and thou shalt be saved, and thy house.

book_long_title: The Acts of the Apostles
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: And when neither sun nor stars in many days appeared, and no small tempest lay on us, all hope that we should be saved was then taken away.

book_long_title: The Acts of the Apostles
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: Paul said to the centurion and to the soldiers, Except these abide in the ship, ye cannot be saved.

book_long_title: The Acts of the Apostles
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: And it shall come to pass, that whosoever shall call on the name of the Lord shall be saved.

book_long_title: The Acts of the Apostles
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: Neither is there salvation in any other: for there is none other name under heaven given among men, whereby we must be saved.

book_long_title: The Acts of the Apostles
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: Praising God, and having favour with all the people. And the Lord added to the church daily such as should be saved.

book_long_title: The Acts of the Apostles
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: Who shall tell thee words, whereby thou and all thy house shall be saved.

book_long_title: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: And so all Israel shall be saved: as it is written, There shall come out of Sion the Deliverer, and shall turn away ungodliness from Jacob:

book_long_title: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: For whosoever shall call upon the name of the Lord shall be saved.

book_long_title: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: That if thou shalt confess with thy mouth the Lord Jesus, and shalt believe in thine heart that God hath raised him from the dead, thou shalt be saved.

book_long_title: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: Brethren, my heart's desire and prayer to God for Israel is, that they might be saved.

book_long_title: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: Esaias also crieth concerning Israel, Though the number of the children of Israel be as the sand of the sea, a remnant shall be saved:

book_long_title: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: For we are saved by hope: but hope that is seen is not hope: for what a man seeth, why doth he yet hope for?

book_long_title: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: For if, when we were enemies, we were reconciled to God by the death of his Son, much more, being reconciled, we shall be saved by his life.

book_long_title: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: Much more then, being now justified by his blood, we shall be saved from wrath through him.

book_long_title: The First Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Corinthians
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: Even as I please all men in all things, not seeking mine own profit, but the profit of many, that they may be saved.

book_long_title: The First Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Corinthians
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: By which also ye are saved, if ye keep in memory what I preached unto you, unless ye have believed in vain.

book_long_title: The First Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Corinthians
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: If any man's work shall be burned, he shall suffer loss: but he himself shall be saved; yet so as by fire.

book_long_title: The First Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Corinthians
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: To deliver such an one unto Satan for the destruction of the flesh, that the spirit may be saved in the day of the Lord Jesus.

book_long_title: The First Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Corinthians
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: For the preaching of the cross is to them that perish foolishness; but unto us which are saved it is the power of God.

book_long_title: The Second Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Corinthians
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: For we are unto God a sweet savour of Christ, in them that are saved, and in them that perish:

book_long_title: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Ephesians
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: Even when we were dead in sins, hath quickened us together with Christ, (by grace ye are saved;)

book_long_title: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Ephesians
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: For by grace are ye saved through faith; and that not of yourselves: it is the gift of God:

book_long_title: The First Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Thessalonians
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: Forbidding us to speak to the Gentiles that they might be saved, to fill up their sins alway: for the wrath is come upon them to the uttermost.

book_long_title: The Second Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Thessalonians
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: And with all deceivableness of unrighteousness in them that perish; because they received not the love of the truth, that they might be saved.

book_long_title: The First Epistle of Paul the Apostle to Timothy
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: Who will have all men to be saved, and to come unto the knowledge of the truth.

book_long_title: The First Epistle of Paul the Apostle to Timothy
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: Notwithstanding she shall be saved in childbearing, if they continue in faith and charity and holiness with sobriety.

book_long_title: The Second Epistle of Paul the Apostle to Timothy
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: Who hath saved us, and called us with an holy calling, not according to our works, but according to his own purpose and grace, which was given us in Christ Jesus before the world began,

book_long_title: The Epistle of Paul to Titus
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: Not by works of righteousness which we have done, but according to his mercy he saved us, by the washing of regeneration, and renewing of the Holy Ghost;

book_long_title: The First Epistle General of Peter
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: Which sometime were disobedient, when once the longsuffering of God waited in the days of Noah, while the ark was a preparing, wherein few, that is, eight souls were saved by water.

book_long_title: The First Epistle General of Peter
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: And if the righteous scarcely be saved, where shall the ungodly and the sinner appear?

book_long_title: The Second Epistle General of Peter
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: And spared not the old world, but saved Noah the eighth person, a preacher of righteousness, bringing in the flood upon the world of the ungodly;

book_long_title: The General Epistle of Jude
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: I will therefore put you in remembrance, though ye once knew this, how that the Lord, having saved the people out of the land of Egypt, afterward destroyed them that believed not.

book_long_title: The Revelation of St John the Divine
volume_subtitle: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
scripture_text: And the nations of them which are saved shall walk in the light of it: and the kings of the earth do bring their glory and honour into it.
